name: Melting Heart Pose
setup: Start in tabletop position (hands and knees)
Walk hands forward while keeping hips over knees
Lower chest toward mat, forehead or chin to ground
Arms extended forward, palms down or together in prayer
steps: Keep hips stacked over knees (don't shift back)
Feel stretch through shoulders, chest, and upper back
mistakes: Shifting hips back (becomes child's pose, less shoulder stretch)
safety: Deep shoulder stretch. If shoulders feel pinched or painful, reduce depth or place blanket under chest. Excellent for post-pressing recovery.

progressions: Melting heart with side bend (walk hands to one side)

prescriptionHints.notes: Hold 3-5 min for yin practice. Deep shoulder and chest opening, especially after bench press.

joints.notes: Keep hips over knees to maximize shoulder stretch. Avoid if experiencing acute shoulder pain.
